issues.title: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

any.message: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.23:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ee, surrounding text: #000000)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.23:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ee, surrounding text: #000000)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
